title: Intro to Data Analytics
description: Covers fundamental concepts of data analytics including data collection, cleaning, and visualization.

title: Statistics for Data Analytics
description: Key statistical methods for analytics including probability, distributions, and hypothesis testing.

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: An introduction to supervised and unsupervised learning, models, and training workflows.

title: Big Data and Cloud in Analytics
description: Explains big data architectures, cloud platforms, and their role in analytics pipelines.

title: Data Visualization Essentials
description: Principles and practices of effective data visualization, charts, and storytelling with data.

title: SQL for Data Analysis
description: SQL basics and advanced queries for data analytics and business intelligence.
